item.title: Advent of Mobile Web Apps
item.description: Pros and Cons of Native and Web Applications Native Apps Pros Has access to almost all device capabilities (GPS, Serial Communication, Camera, etc.) Easy to find apps from the app store Performance is good Supports push notifications Multi threaded Cons Needs an install Ensuring everyone is using the latest version is a pain Consumes more space on the disk as compared to a web app Is regulated by the provider (Google, Apple, etc.
